#Length units in [mm]
#Reflectivity of interior wall: rho = 0.9
#Radius of sphere: R = 0.5

# - core diameter: 2*a_s = 0.105
# - clad diameter: 2*b_s = 0.125
# - numerical aperture: NA_s = 0.22
#
#Pick-up fiber:
# - core diameter: 2*a_p = 0.105
# - clad diameter: 2*b_p = 0.125
# - numerical aperture: NA_p = 0.22

#Entrance radius: r_e = 2*b_p = 0.125

#Delta alpha: d_alpha = 0.01
